trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SEQ_00<tab>The veteran Radiant wishes to share his gratitude.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Y'shtola at the High Crucible of Al-Kimiya.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Y'shtola at Sharlayan's aetheryte plaza and have her accompany you.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Montichaigne while Y'shtola is accompanying you.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the House Leveilleur butler while Y'shtola is accompanying you.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_TODO_04<tab>Accompany Y'shtola to the Baldesion Annex and speak with her.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_ESTINIEN_000_001<tab>Vrtra is warming to his role as satrap. Clearly all those years behind the curtain were not spent napping.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_WARRIOR04532_000_010<tab>Thank you for putting forth Khalzahl's name. Those whose lives he enriched will take comfort in seeing his legacy honored.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_WARRIOR04532_000_011<tab>You will forgive me for not speaking sooner, but I bear a message from Archon Y'shtola. She asks that you meet her at the High Crucible at your earliest convenience.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_ESTINIEN_000_012<tab>Understood. Thank you.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_ESTINIEN_000_013<tab>Y'shtola must have finished her study of the voidgate. Shall we hear what she has to say, then?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_VARSHAHN_000_014<tab>I will go with you.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_ESTINIEN_000_015<tab>I thought the satrap would be too busy setting up the foundation...?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_VARSHAHN_000_016<tab>My clerks have been the well-oiled cogs of this administration since before Ahewann assumed the office. They understand what needs to be done.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_VARSHAHN_000_017<tab>And I am curious to learn what conclusions your Archon has reached concerning the gate's unique construction.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_ESTINIEN_000_018<tab>As you wish. Allow me to lead the way, Your Excellency.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_WARRIOR04532_000_050<tab>You can find your way to the High Crucible, I trust? I must rejoin my unit and assist with bringing the city's orphans under our care.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_ESTINIEN_000_055<tab>For one who claims it is “too late” to save his sister, Vrtra seems awfully interested in whatever revelations Y'shtola might have to share.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_VARSHAHN_000_060<tab>Shall we hear what your scholarly comrade has to say?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_VARSHAHN_000_100<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_110<tab>If we're to enter Noumenon's restricted archives with a minimum of fuss, then we must secure the permission of the Forum.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_111<tab>First, however, we shall need to enlist the cooperation of a member to broach the matter on our behalf. Who do you think might be inclined to assist us?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_117<tab>No one springs to mind?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_118<tab>Hm... What of Scholarch Montichaigne?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_119<tab>He did come to G'raha's defense during the inquiry, after all.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_120<tab>'Tis settled. Let us head to Phenomenon and see if he's willing to help us once more.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SYSTEM_000_117<tab>Y'shtola is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SYSTEM_000_118<tab>You can leave Y'shtola behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SYSTEM_000_119<tab>If you wish to have Y'shtola accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_150<tab>I apprenticed to Master Matoya at the age of seven, and labored under her tutelage for a full decade. I never had the chance to attend the Studium...

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_155<tab>Neither did Thancred, as I recall. Soon after Master Louisoix took him in off the streets, he was put in the care of another Archon. His was a rigorous and practical education in the arts of espionage and survival.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_160<tab>I sometimes wonder what my life might have been like had I pursued studies here instead...
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_A2_000_001<tab>Tea at the Last Stand after a day of lectures?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_A2_000_003<tab>Should...should I wonder as well?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_170<tab>Oh, that does sound lovely. Afternoons with friends spent sipping tea and debating theories.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_175<tab>...Still, I wouldn't give up my time with Master Matoya for the world.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_180<tab>The dank cave I studied in was about as far from the bright, airy halls of academia as one could get. But it was a wondrous, magical childhood nonetheless.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_190<tab>Oh, never mind me. 'Twas just an idle thought.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_A3_000_001<tab>Talk.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_A3_000_002<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_A3_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_A3_000_004<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the Studium.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_201<tab>If I was pressed to name our allies in the Forum, Scholarch Montichaigne would certainly be at the top of the list. Hopefully he agrees to aid us with our request.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Y'shtola?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_203<tab>Need to be somewhere? Very well, I will wait for you by the aetheryte.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_204<tab>Oh, not to worry─I had plenty of reading to keep me occupied while you were busy. Shall we continue?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_205<tab>Archon Y'shtola wishes a word with me? Then I shall eagerly await her arrival!
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>You must be accompanied by Y'shtola and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SYSTEM_000_207<tab>Y'shtola has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_208<tab>Ah, visitors! And quite esteemed ones at that. What may I do for you?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_209<tab>Pray forgive the intrusion, Scholarch, but we were hoping you might help us secure permission to enter Noumenon's restricted archives.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_210<tab>Oho! No furtive forays into the stacks this time, eh?

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_211<tab>I applaud this newfound sense of propriety. Yet in all this wide world of comparative serenity, what so compels you to disturb a vault of forbidden wisdom?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_212<tab>Fascinating. I had no idea such a technique existed.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_213<tab>I would've been surprised if you had. If my assumption is correct, the research left behind by House Daemir has lain dormant in Sharlayan's archives for many centuries.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_214<tab>And if you unearth this research, what then? Surely you don't intend to cross over into the void?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_215<tab>That is, in fact, precisely what we intend.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_216<tab>...To what end, pray tell?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_217<tab>To develop a method of traversing the rift, for one, that I might keep my word to a distant friend.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_100_217<tab>Sentiment aside, I have journeyed to the end of existence. I have heard, felt, and thought endlessly about the truth of our world and the echo of its future. And yet I want to understand <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>─to unravel it all down to its very last secret.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_218<tab>What scholar worthy of the name wouldn't force open a voidgate or two if a grand revelation was the promised reward?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_219<tab>Hahaha! Marvelous!
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_220<tab>An audacious proposal worthy of Master Matoya herself!
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_221<tab>And after hearing the whys and the wherefores, I for one do not believe you would use the knowledge for ill.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_222<tab>I see no reason not to present your request for the Forum's consideration.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_223<tab>Although... Your petition would be better received if you also had the support of another well-placed acquaintance.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_224<tab>Why, Master Fourchenault, of course! He can hardly ignore an earnest request from his dear children's most treasured comrades.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_225<tab>I was hesitant to approach him directly, but there is no denying that having Master Fourchenault on our side would tip the balance in our favor. Very well. We will pay a visit to the Leveilleur estate and plead our case.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_226<tab>Ah, one last thing before you go. I would consider it a personal favor if you might share with me the discoveries you make in the void.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_227<tab>My appetite for knowledge is every bit as insatiable as yours, I'd wager, so if you could see your way to indulging an old man's curiosity...?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_228<tab>Of course, Scholarch. We will be sure to pass on any revelations.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_230<tab>The Forum can be a cantankerous beast─one needs a persuasive voice to get it moving in the desired direction.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_250<tab>Montichaigne seemed optimistic, but I doubt convincing Fourchenault to champion our cause will be as simple as showing up on his doorstep.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_BUTLER04532_000_254<tab>Welcome to the Leveilleur residence. Have you come alone, or should we expect a larger party...?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_SYSTEM_000_255<tab>You must be accompanied by Y'shtola and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_BUTLER04532_000_256<tab>Ah, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Mistress Y'shtola, how may I be of service?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_257<tab>We've come to speak with Master Fourchenault. Is he home, by any chance?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_BUTLER04532_000_258<tab>Yes, the master is in residence. I shall inform him that he has guests.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_259<tab>Well, well. Ameliance would invite you inside for tea, but I assume this is not a social visit. You have some matter of import to discuss?
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_260<tab>Then pray proceed─you have my full attention.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_261<tab>Well, I suppose I should praise you for following the proper protocols this time around...

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_262<tab>Scholarch Montichaigne expressed much the same sentiment. I assure you, we'll not attempt to circumvent the Forum's authority again...unless it is absolutely necessary, of course.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_263<tab>...Of course.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_264<tab>You do understand that the restricted archives are restricted for good reason, yes? If no pressing need exists, then why risk the consequences of employing this forbidden knowledge?

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_265<tab>For a brother who misses his sister. She was his guardian and his friend─a selfless hero who crossed the rift between worlds to save her homeland from horror and suffering.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_200_265<tab>But the brother has given up on thoughts of reunion. He spends his efforts elsewhere, watching over a people yet healing from the flames of the Final Days, loyal to his duty while betraying the longing in his heart.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_300_265<tab>'Tis no vital mission, perhaps, reuniting these siblings. But it feels a worthy cause to pursue, all the same.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_400_265<tab>As one who feared losing his own loved ones, and spent years in research to prevent it, surely you appreciate how painful such a separation must be.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_269<tab>Reflections are still very much a mystery to us. Offering to share your experiences in the First should constitute a fair exchange for our cooperation.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_270<tab>Do not celebrate just yet. The Forum must still be convinced.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_271<tab>I will add your request to the list of today's deliberations, and deliver the decision to you at the Baldesion Annex.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_BUTLER04532_000_280<tab>Please do come again. We are always glad to receive such close companions of the twins.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_300<tab>The matter is out of our hands. All that remains is to return to the annex and await word of the Forum's decision.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_304<tab>So. What did the Forum decide?

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_305<tab>To put it bluntly, Master Matoya has burned some bridges here in Sharlayan─and salted the earth for good measure. When it became clear that her student was the petitioner in question, well, no few members voiced their discontent...
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_306<tab>Then the chamber was reminded─in no uncertain terms, I might add─of the incredible debt we owe to you and your companions.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_307<tab>That served to silence the grumbles and stiffen a few spines, and it was agreed that allowing you entry to the archives was the least we could do in return.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_308<tab>That is wonderful news. Thank you both for speaking on our behalf.

TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_309<tab>Yes, well... As I am sure you are aware, this permission was not extended lightly. Forbidden knowledge is to be treated with the utmost caution, and there will be repercussions if it is not.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_FOURCHENAULT_000_310<tab>I wish you well in your endeavor, and bid you good day.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_311<tab>Ever the same, that one...
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_312<tab>Uncompromising? Aye, but that very stoicism is exactly what Sharlayan needed to guide it through not one, but two exoduses.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_MONTICHAIGNE_000_350<tab>If I were but five years younger, I'd cast aside my lectern and join you on your adventures in a heartbeat...
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_360<tab>That went rather well, I think.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_361<tab>As a child, I dreamed up any number of schemes for getting my hands on those forbidden tomes... And now I can simply walk in through the door.
TEXT_AKTKMH107_04532_YSHTOLA_000_362<tab>Our focus will be on finding House Daemir's research notes, of course, but the thought of so much knowledge at my disposal has me feeling a little giddy.
